verses.verse: My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2192>hold<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, the Lord of <S%G1391>glory<s%>, <S%G1722>with<s%> respect of <S%G4382>persons<s%>.

and <S%G2532><s%> ye have <S%G1914>regard<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> him <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G5409>weareth<s%> the <S%G2986>fine<s%> <S%G2066>clothing<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%>, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2521>Sit<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> in a good <S%G2573>place<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G2036>say<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G2476>man<s%>, Stand <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> sit2521, Ephesians2 <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5286>footstool<s%>;

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> have <S%G818>dishonored<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G2616>man<s%>. Do <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G2616>oppress<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G1670>drag<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>before<s%> the <S%G2922>judgment-seats<s%>?
Do <S%G987><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G987>blaspheme<s%> the <S%G2570>honorable<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> are <S%G1941>called<s%>?

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye have respect of <S%G4380>persons<s%>, ye <S%G2038>commit<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>, being <S%G1651>convicted<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3848>transgressors<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he that <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G3431>Do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%>, <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G5407>Do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5407>kill<s%>. <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> thou dost <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5407>killest<s%>, thou art <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

So <S%G3779><s%> speak <S%G2980>ye<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> men that <S%G3195>are<s%> to be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> a <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1657>liberty<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> is without <S%G448>mercy<s%> to <S%G4160>him<s%> that hath <S%G4160>showed<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%>: <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> glorieth <S%G2620>against<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> doth it <S%G3786>profit<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> he <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3361>works<s%>? <S%G1410>can<s%> that <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>?

and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5217>Go<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G2328>be<s%> ye <S%G2328>warmed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5526>filled<s%>; and <S%G1161>yet<s%> ye <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the things <S%G2006>needful<s%> to the <S%G4983>body<s%>; <S%G5101>what<s%> doth it <S%G3786>profit<s%>?

Yea <S%G235><s%>, a <S%G5100>man<s%> will <S%G2046>say<s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, and <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>: <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1537>apart<s%> from <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, and <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> will <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

Ye see3708, Acts6 <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>.
